mapper.select: select m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}

select distinct rm.menu_id from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and menu_id in (select menu_id from sys_menu where menu_type = #{menuType})
select user_id from sys_user where username = #{username}

select u.user_id userId, u.username, u.user_work userWork, u.user_head_picture userHeadPicture, u.user_true_name userTrueName, u.user_nickname userNickname, u.mobile from sys_user u where 1=1
and u.is_party_member = 1
and u.is_cadres = 1
and u.user_dept = #{params.userDept}
and u.user_org = #{params.userOrg}
and (u.user_true_name like concat('%',#{params.name},'%') or u.user_nickname like concat('%',#{params.name},'%'))
and (u.is_public = #{params.isPublic} or u.is_public = 3)
